short_summary: Request for Proposal for Individual Equipment
full_summary:
==========================

**Title**
--------

[CANCELLED] Request for Proposal (RFP) for Special Purpose Clothing and Individual Equipment

**Tender Announcement**
---------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to cancel the Request for Proposal (RFP) W8485-237343/A, which was originally posted on September 6, 2022.

**Background**
-------------

This RFP was issued under the Trade Agreements and was open to all qualified suppliers.

**Key Information**
-------------------

*   **Notice Type:** Demand for proposals
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** This tender is eligible for the following trade agreements:

    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** The world
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
*   **End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Cancellation**
--------------

This tender has been cancelled.

**Contact**
----------

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

*   Danny Lebel
*   Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

**End**
------

This tender has been cancelled, and no further action is required.
